channel.title: Need an Experienced Coder
channel.description:
Okay, I am trying to figure out how to add something like a rewards system. But, I do not know how!
I cannot figure out how to make it so that I can make a [code] ::reward (player)[/code] command because I don't know how to make something like:[code] playerReward + 1;[/code] So... How do I make it so that I can make a playerReward thingy or anything else please? Thanks!
I rep anybody who gives good help. If I'm not ALLOWED to say I'll rep someone, just tell me and I delete this. For all I remember, you're only allowed not to ASK for rep.

item.title: Need an Experienced Coder
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I don’t want a PK Reward system… I just want to learn how to make something like clanRights where I can add into a command, clanRights or playerRep… I don’t know how to make something like playerRep though. That’s what I want to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Need an Experienced Coder
item.dc:creator: @pacman89012 pacman89012
item.description:
@pacman89012 wrote:

pimp comes wit one lol 1 sec i might be able to copy past my reward system onto here.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 09:14:52 AM[/size][hr]ya i got it ok just make a bunch of these with your items.

public void checkPKReward() { if(pkpoints == 500) { addItem(1038, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); }

Read full topic
